¿Quieres trabajar con nosotros?: Do you want to work with us?
¿CÓMO QUIERES RECIBIR TU PEDIDO?: HOW WOULD YOU LIKE TO RECEIVE YOUR ORDER?
Pizzería Brenda es un negocio familiar q: Pizzeria Brenda is a family-owned business founded by two brothers, Manuel and Federico Lorenzo Mellado, in 1986. It was the first pizzeria to open in Chipiona.
Comenzamos este negocio en un pequeño lo: We started this business in a small family-owned place with a lot of excitement, but also with a lot of uncertainty, as we were very young and had the idea of introducing pizza to our town, which was a completely new and unknown product in our locality during those years.
Ya desde entonces, y hasta hoy, el lema: Since then, and until today, the motto of our business has always been innovation. Our company was the first to offer home delivery service and self-service in the premises, which provided us with agility and speed in our service.
Nuestra especialidad son las pizzas tota: Our specialty is completely homemade pizzas, with our own dough and natural ingredients of the highest quality. We are very committed to offering our customers a completely natural, homemade, and high-quality product.
Esto es precisamente lo que más valoran: This is precisely what our customers value the most, and thanks to their acceptance and loyalty, we have been able to expand and modernize our business according to their demands.
En nuestro local, además de la pizza, se: In addition to pizza, our establishment offers a variety of options including Italian pasta, rice dishes, salads, diverse dishes, baguettes, and a burger service. All of this comes with the best value for money in the area.
La Pizzería Brenda está ubicada en el ce: Pizzería Brenda is located in the center of Chipiona, and we have a spacious terrace where our customers can enjoy a great atmosphere and receive friendly service from our young and attentive staff.
Nuestro equipo está compuesto por un gru: Our team is composed of a group of young individuals who bring dynamism, freshness, and new ideas to revamp our dishes, which is why we constantly offer new items and promotions on our menu.
También disponemos de servicio a domicil: We also offer home delivery service so you can enjoy our dishes without leaving your home.
¡Te esperamos! ¡Visítanos!: We look forward to seeing you! Come visit us!

¿La pizzería abre por la mañana?: Does the pizzeria open in the morning?
La pizzería abre los domingos por la mañ: The pizzeria opens every Sunday morning from October 1st to May 30th.
¿Hay servicio a domicilio fuera de Chipi: Is there home delivery service outside of Chipiona?
No, sólo ofrecemos nuestro servicio dent: No, we only offer our service within the municipal area.
¿Qué horario tiene la pizzería?: What are the opening hours of the pizzeria?
There's a parking 500 m from the pizzeria.
Tenemos una base de pizza sin gluten esp: We have a gluten-free pizza crust specially made for people with celiac disease, to which you can add the toppings of your choice. Additionally, the menu provides information about the allergens of each ingredient.
¿Los camareros sirven en la mesa?: Do the waiters serve at the table?
No, la pizzería es autoservicio, pero lo: No, the pizzeria is self-service, but the waiters will assist you with anything you need.
¿Qué tamaños de pizzas hay?: What sizes of pizzas are available?
Tenemos una pizza grande para 4 personas: We have a large pizza for 4 people and a small pizza for approximately 2 people.
¿Cuánto cuesta el servicio a domicilio?: How much does the home delivery service cost?
2 € adicionales al pedido que se realice: There is an additional €2 charge for any order placed for home delivery.

¡Recuerda! En la sección de pizzas, pued: Remember! In the pizza section, you can create your own pizza by choosing the ingredients you want.

Elige el evento que quieras, indica el n: Choose the event you prefer, as well as the number of people, the day, and the time, and we will soon confirm your reservation.
